projects.title: Web Development
projects.description1: We built state-of-the-art responsive web interfaces. We work with the latest frameworks and tools to provide instant deployment, optimal seo and a captivating user experience.
projects.description2: Our preferred stack is Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript with Vercel databases. We built in Cursor for rapid-builds.
projects.imageAlt: Modern web development interface showing responsive design

projects.title: iOS Apps
projects.description1: Rely on our expertise in native iOS development using Swift. We use SwiftUI to create seamless native user experiences.
projects.description2: We guide you all the way from design, development to publish to bring your vision into the app store.
projects.imageAlt: Photo by Yura Fresh on Unsplash

projects.title: AI
projects.description1: See past the hype and build with us real-world AI applications that solve problems and drive business growth.
projects.description2: We specilised in working with the latest AI API's to integreate GenAI features into your existing workflows.

projects.title: Cloud Services
projects.description1: We are certified experts in AWS cloud services.
projects.description2: Let us help you see through the architectural struggles and help you implement an architecture that keeps your running costs in check.

projects.title: Vision OS
projects.description1: The apple vision pro has changed the game. And we know how to make it work for you.
projects.description2: Additionally, we can set you up with 3D models and animations for augmented reality or other VR platforms.
projects.imageAlt: Apple Vision Pro spatial computing experience
